Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.Tests.unit_tests2

print("I'm : ", __name__)



[docs]def min_max(test, *args):
    res = args[0]
    for arg in args:
        if test(arg, res):
            res = arg
    return res




[docs]def less_than(x, y): return x < y




[docs]def greater_than(x, y): return x > y



if __name__ == '__main__':  # tests , won't run if module is imported
    print(min_max(less_than, 4, 2, 1, 4, 67, 8, 9, 3, 1))
    print(min_max(greater_than, 4, 2, 1, 4, 67, 8, 9, 3, 1))
